title: Failed
explanation: From the answers you provided, the claimant has failed the knockout questions and is not eligible for the Work Health Programme.

detail.message: The customer failed on the following questions
failedQuestions: Has the individual previously been on the Work and Health Programme?

questions.text: As you have indicated that the claimant is Long Term unemployed - would you like to send the claimant details to the gatekeeper?
